sermons.title: Chapel of the Air - Characteristics of Revival
How the Spirit Sends Revival
sermons.description: A great summary of revival and the work of the Holy Spirit from the time of Finney through the time of Moody.

sermons.title: Is Revival the Work of God or the Work of Man?
sermons.description: A good overview of revival, especially a good explanation of the real beginnings of the 1857 revival in Hamilton, Canada before Jeremiah Lamphier's prayer meeting in New York. Dr. Orr also speaks of some of his conversations with Billy Graham and has a great discussion of techniques in revival.

sermons.title: Monday #2 The Work of the Holy Spirit
sermons.description: This series was delivered by Dr. Orr in February of 1983 at Wallace Memorial Presbyterian Church. It was a series that he himself regarded as a good summary of his teaching and ministry. On most evenings Dr. Orr began with a lecture on the history of revival, then concluded with a message on the Biblical understanding and preparation for revival.

sermons.title: What is Conscience
sermons.description: Brother Orr searches and explains exhaustively on what exactly the conscience is, what it does, and what can happen to it by ignoring it. "But somebody else said to me,'Your conscience teaches right from wrong.' Does it? Always? The Scripture doesn't teach that. The Scripture speaks of a pure conscience, it often speaks of a rotten conscience."
